DOC.brief_summary: This single-arm , open-label , local multicenter study evaluate safety tolerability Herceptin ( trastuzumab ) administer subcutaneously single-use injection device ( SID ) patient HER2-positive early breast cancer . Following surgery ( neo-adjuvant adjuvant chemotherapy ) , patient receive Herceptin 600 mg subcutaneously SID every 3 week total 1 year , unless disease recurrence unacceptable toxicity occurs . After first 3 cycle , patient permit self-administer Herceptin supervision HCP .
